title: Download GIS data from BOEM's Office of Renewable Energy Program — query_boem
Download GIS data from BOEM's Office of Renewable Energy Program — query_boem
text: type character string type GIS data like download. Can : active lease outlines planning area outlines project phases export cables substations turbine locations cable interconnections data collection devices cable corridors cable landings interarray cables

text: list two named elements: 1) meta stores metadata 2) data stores sf data frame.
